# Covers JetBraindIDEs: IntelliJ, RubyMine, PhpStorm, AppCode, PyCharm, Clion, Android Studio,
WebStorm and Rider

#Reference: https://Intellij-supporst.jetbrains.com/hc/en-us/articles/206544839

# IntelliJ IDEA
/**/out/
!**/src/main/**/out/
!**/src/test/**/out/

# User-specific stuff
/**/.idea/**/workspace.xml
/**/.idea/**/tasks.xml
/**/.idea/**/vcs.xml
/**/.idea/**/misc.xml
/**/.idea/**/usage.statistics.xml
/**/.idea/**/dictionaries
/**/.idea/**/shelf

/**/.idea/**/contentModel.xml
